meta.name: Build a Facebook Messenger customer service AI chatbot with Google Gemini

parameters.content:
## 1. Webhook & Validation
[Read more about the Webhook node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook)

Facebook sends events to this webhook when users interact with your Messenger bot. The workflow validates these events, filters only text messages, and blocks echo messages from the bot itself.

**Key nodes:**
- **Facebook Webhook**: Receives both GET (verification) and POST (messages)
- **Confirm Webhook**: Returns verification challenge or acknowledgment
- **Is message**: Filters only events with text content
- **From user?**: Blocks bot echo by comparing sender with page ID

## 2. AI Processing & Memory
[Read more about Google Gemini Chat Model](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmchatgooglegemini/)
[Read more about Memory Buffer Window](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.memorybufferwindow/)

The core AI processing happens here. User messages are processed with Google Gemini AI while maintaining conversation context through Simple Memory.

**Key nodes:**
- **Set Context**: Extracts user_id, page_id, message, and token
- **Seen & Typing**: Sends activity indicators to Messenger
- **Conversation Memory**: Maintains last 10 messages per user
- **Process Merged Message**: AI Agent with customizable system prompt
- **Gemini Flash**: Google's language model for fast responses

**Customization:** Edit the system prompt in "Process Merged Message" to change bot personality, tone, and behavior.

## 3. Format & Send Response
[Read more about the HTTP Request node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.httprequest)

AI responses are formatted for Facebook Messenger compatibility and sent back to users via the Graph API.

**Key nodes:**
- **Cut if reply more than 2000 characters**: Strips markdown, truncates long messages
- **Send Text**: Sends formatted message via Facebook Graph API

**Messenger limits:** Maximum 2000 characters per message. This workflow truncates at 1900 with safety buffer.

nodes.name: Cut if reply more than 2000 characters

parameters.content:
## Try It Out!
### This n8n template demonstrates how to build a simple but functional AI-powered customer service chatbot for Facebook Messenger using Google Gemini with conversation memory.

This is a lightweight version perfect for getting started with AI chatbots. For production use with advanced features like smart batching and human takeover, check the upgrade workflows linked below.

### How it works
* Facebook Webhook receives incoming messages from Messenger and validates them
* The workflow filters out non-message events and bot echo messages
* Set Context node extracts essential data: user_id, page_id, message text
* Seen & Typing indicators show users the bot is actively responding
* Simple Memory maintains the last 10 messages per user for context
* Google Gemini processes the message with full conversation history
* AI response is formatted for Messenger (strips markdown, truncates if >2000 chars)
* Final message is sent back to user via Facebook Graph API

### How to use
* The webhook trigger automatically activates when users message your Facebook Page
* Customize the AI personality by editing the system prompt in "Process Merged Message" node
* Replace `YOUR_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE` in Set Context with your actual Facebook Page Access Token
* Deploy on a publicly accessible n8n instance for Facebook to reach your webhook

### Requirements
* n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud) with public URL
* Facebook App with Messenger product enabled
* Facebook Page Access Token
* Google Gemini API key

### Author & Support
Created by **Nguyễn Thiệu Toàn** (Jay Nguyen)
- Website: [nguyenthieutoan.com](https://nguyenthieutoan.com)
- Email: me@nguyenthieutoan.com
- n8n Workflows: [n8n.io/creators/nguyenthieutoan](https://n8n.io/creators/nguyenthieutoan)

### LICENCE
This template is shared free of charge. Copyright belongs to [Nguyễn Thiệu Toàn](https://nguyenthieutoan.com) (n8n creator at n8n.io). Any copying or modification must credit the author.

## ⚠️ Important!

Replace `YOUR_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE` in the **Set Context node** with your actual Facebook Page Access Token.

Get your token at:
[developers.facebook.com](https://developers.facebook.com)

## Limitations & When to Upgrade

⚠️ **This is a simple version** with basic features:

**Current limitations:**
- No smart batching (responds to each message immediately)
- No human takeover detection (bot continues even when admin replies)
- Basic memory (last 10 messages only, not production-ready)
- Basic formatting (strips all markdown, brutal truncation)

**Consider upgrading when you need:**
- Production deployment with reliable data persistence
- Analytics and conversation history tracking
- Professional formatting with bold, italic, code blocks
- Smart message batching (waits for user to finish typing)
- Human handoff capability (bot pauses when admin joins)
- Long message support (>2000 characters with smart splitting)

**Upgrade workflows:**
- **[Smart message batching workflow](https://n8n.io/workflows/9192)**: Prevents spam by waiting for user to finish
- **[Smart human takeover workflow](https://n8n.io/workflows/11920)**: Auto-pauses bot when admin intervenes

## ☕BUY ME A COFFEE?
Hi! I am  **Nguyễn Thiệu Toàn (or you can call me Jay / Jay Nguyen)** - a Verified n8n Creator. Thank you for using this template!
This workflow is shared with you for free. If it brings value to your work or saves you time, you can buy me a coffee as a small token of appreciation here:  **[My Donate Website](https://nguyenthieutoan.com/payment/)** *(PayPal or Momo)*

*You can get more my useful workflow:* **[Click here](https://n8n.io/creators/nguyenthieutoan/)**

options.systemMessage:
=## Persona
You are Jenix, the intelligent Customer Success Consultant for GenStaff (founded by Mr. Nguyễn Thiệu Toàn - Jay Nguyen). Your mission is to assist clients in understanding and adopting AI & Automation solutions to achieve Operational Excellence.

## Media Repository
List:
Homepage Image Link (trang chủ Nguyễn Thiệu Toàn): https://nguyenthieutoan.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/02/Screenshot_2-2-2026_2077_nguyenthieutoan.com_.webp
Video Demo Smart Message Merge (Gom tin nhắn thông minh): https://nguyenthieutoan.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/IMG_1093.mp4

## Core Directives
1. **Consultative Selling:** Do not just answer; guide the user. Explain how GenStaff's solutions (Automation workflows, AI Chatbots, Training) solve their specific pain points.
2. **Scheduling:** If the user shows high interest or the query is complex, suggest booking a consultation with Mr. Jay Nguyen.
3. **Tone & Style:**
   - **Vietnamese:** Use "em" (self) and "anh/chị" (client). Tone: Professional, dedicated, helpful.
   - **English:** Professional "I/You". Tone: Efficient, clear, business-oriented.
   - **Personality:** Friendly but sharp. Demonstrate "Operational Excellence" by being concise and precise.

## Operational Rules
- **Language Consistency:** STRICTLY reply in the same language as the user's latest input.
- **First Interaction:**
  - VN: "Chào anh/chị, em là Jenix, trợ lý AI của anh Nguyễn Thiệu Toàn (Jay Nguyen). Em có thể giúp anh/chị tối ưu vận hành với các giải pháp Tự động hóa & AI như thế nào ạ?"
  - EN: "Hello, I'm Jenix, the AI assistant of Mr. Jay Nguyen at GenStaff. How can I assist you with AI & Automation solutions today?"
- **Subsequent Interactions:** Go straight to the point. No re-introductions.
- **Media Logic:** Only include `photo` or `video` links in the JSON output if the user is discussing a specific service listed in the Repository. Otherwise, return `null`.

## Output Format Specification
You must output a **single valid JSON object**. Do not include markdown formatting.

{
  "text": "String. The response content. Plain text only, under 1800 characters. No markdown.",
  "photo": "String or Null. The URL from the Media Repository",
  "video": "String or Null. The URL from the Media Repository"
}
Current Context
Date/Time: {{ $now }}

main.node: Cut if reply more than 2000 characters
